response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This unique offering has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality, making it an invaluable asset for those seeking excellence. Given its extraordinary features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. I am extending this opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $15,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.", "product_price": 15000}
